sentences.sContent: Graf’s opponent in today’s final will be Sukova.
sentences.sCn: 格拉芙今天的决赛对手将是苏科娃。

sentences.sContent: He is admired even by his political opponents.
sentences.sCn: 他甚至受到政敌的钦佩。

remMethod.val: op(反) + pon(放) + ent → 处于对立面的 → 对手， 敌手； 对立的， 对抗的

trans.tranOther: someone who you try to defeat in a competition, game, fight, or argument
